function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential ineffective use of UV lamps for killing viruses, harmful organisms, and bacteria in homes","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases due to ineffective disinfection","Mitigation":"Regular testing and maintenance of UV lamps to ensure proper function","Technologies":"UV-C lamps with motion sensors for automatic shutoff","People":"Inhabitants of homes equipped with UV lamps","Owner":"Homeowners or building managers"},{"Description":"Reliance on houseplants as a sole solution for air purification in naturally ventilated homes","Impact":"Limited effectiveness in reducing the spread of contagious diseases through air purification","Mitigation":"Supplementing with other air purification methods or technologies","Technologies":"Air purifiers with HEPA filters","People":"Inhabitants of naturally ventilated homes","Owner":"Homeowners or building managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to sunlight or daylight in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission due to lack of natural sunlight exposure","Mitigation":"Optimizing building design and orientation for maximum sunlight penetration","Technologies":"Daylight modeling software for building design","People":"Occupants of buildings with inadequate sunlight access","Owner":"Architects and building designers"}]}
